system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provide point of sale retail software to small business. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Customer unable to access sales reports due to a UI error.

conversation_history.message: I’m unable to access the sales reports section in the dashboard. It just shows a blank screen.
Thank you for reaching out, Jessica. Let me check on this for you. Are you seeing any error messages or just the blank screen?
No error messages, just a blank screen. Everything else in the dashboard seems to work fine.
Got it. Could you please try clearing your browser cache and let me know if that resolves the issue?
I cleared the cache and refreshed, but the issue persists. Still seeing the blank screen.

Thanks for letting me know. I’ve identified this as a minor UI bug in the frontend code. The engineering team has pushed a quick fix, and it should now work. Can you try accessing the sales reports again?
It’s working now! I can see the sales reports without any issues. Thanks for the quick resolution.
You’re welcome! Glad to hear it’s resolved. Please let us know if you need further assistance.

resolution: A minor UI bug in the frontend code was fixed by the engineering team.
root_cause: A rendering issue in the React frontend caused the sales reports component to fail under specific conditions.
